words.def: something given for victory or superiority in a contest or competition or for winning a lottery
fully developed or matured and ready to be eaten or used
a platform built out from the shore into the water and supported by piles
A certain type of submarine sandwich .
a dissolute man in fashionable society
dish baked in pastry-lined pan often with a pastry top
An old Portuguese money of account .
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of a circle
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
